name: Bot Battles
description: Build your bot and battle against other players. Be the last bot standing to win the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Recent Processor: Intel Core i3 @ 2.4 GHz Memory: 2000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 240 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Recent Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.4 GHz Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 600 MB available space
